author: Anonymous Calc
title: Pset marking
question: I believe that during short pset grading during the lab, the TA evaluation is worth 25%. If I receive 100% from the autograder on my pset but 75% as my grade on canvas, does the indicate that my TA gave me a mark of 0?
student_answer: I heard that something similar also happened in the last term and it might just be a bug. But yes, for some reason or another, the TA portion of your mark is 0.
